page.shortlink: dt xdialog owner draw strings and dates
page.description: When you want to display date variables, such as Date = {12/23/2005}, you will have a problem because Alpha Five will think that the leading "{" is the start of an owner draw directive. You must escape the "{" by enclosing it in "{ }".
